eu.liveandgov.wp1.server

Class UploadServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • eu.liveandgov.wp1.server.UploadServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class UploadServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Implementation of a sensor data UploadServlet based on org.apache.commons.fileupload see website.

    Test with 

    echo "FILE CONTENTS" | curl localhost:8080/server/upload -F "upfile=@-"
    or 
    cat test-upload-data.txt | curl localhost:8080/server/upload -F "upfile=@-"
    also a python test script is provided in the /scripts/ folder. User: hartmann Date: 10/19/13
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      protected void doGet(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
      Handle GET REQUEST Show a simple HTML Upload form to test the servlet.
      protected void doPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
      Handle POST REQUEST Take form/multi-part attachment with name 'upfile' and write it to the file system.
